global.Nevíte, jak nejlépe přeložit nějaké slov: Are you wondering how to best translate a word? Do you need to come up with a synonym or other suitable expression? Try Treq! Treq is a collection of bilingual Czech/English-foreign language dictionaries, built automatically from the InterCorp parallel corpus.
global.Nejdříve zvolíme výchozí jazyk, v němž j: To use Treq, start by specifying the desired language pair by selecting source language (the language of the query) and target language (the language of the potential equivalents). The query can be entered either as a specific word form, as a lemma (Lemma), as a multiword unit (Multiword) or using regular expressions (Regex). The query can also be made case insensitive (A = a). Depending on the (Restrict to:) parameter, result retrieval can target different text types: the fiction-oriented core texts, specific collections, or the entire corpus. Then enter your query (Query:) and click Search. The query result is a list of all translation candidates of the given word, sorted by decreasing frequency by default. By clicking on a particular candidate, you can browse its occurrences in InterCorp and check the translation contexts. The reported frequency may differ since the corpus query may also find instances where the potential equivalent corresponds to a different word.
global.Treq vychází z textů 9. vydání paralelní: Treq is based on texts from InterCorp, release 9. The first step was to align the original and translated texts word-to-word using statistical methods provided by the GIZA++ program
global.Zarovnané dvojice slov jsou pak setříděn: The aligned word pairs were then sorted and summarized. The results of the automatic excerption were not reviewed; however, the relative frequency of a given pair may serve as an approximate indicator of reliability. The more often an equivalent of a given word occurs in comparison with other equivalents, the more useful it may be.
global.Co je to jádro a co jsou to kolekce?: What is core and what are collections?
global.drobné úpravy rozhraní a oficiální zveře: final inteface polish and official release
global.prohledávání výsledků z jádra Intercorpu: searching through results from Core of Intercorp
global.doplnění dat z dalších částí Intercorpu: adding the data from other parts of Intercorp (collections)
global.integrace do lišty nástrojů ÚČNK na port: Integration of Treq in to the toolbar at korpus.cz main page
global.odkazy na adekvátní dotaz do Kontextu: links to the respective queries in Kontext concordancer
global.doplněn sloupeček procenta v tabulce výs: added the proportion column in the result table
global.přibyla možnost vybírat skupiny kolekcí: you can newly choose any or all collections
global.ke kladení dotazu lze použít regulární v: you can now use RegEx expressions
global.lze ignorovat velká/malá písma v dotazu: option to ignore case of the query
global.přibyl součet výskytů na konci seznamu: sum of all frequencies at the bottom
global.Nástroj pro zarovnání slov a extrakci sl: Tools for word-to-word alignment and wordpairs extraction
global., s díky Ondřeji Bojarovi a Davidu Mareč: . Our thanks are due to Ondřej Bojar and David Mareček for advice on the installation. The results of the automatic excerption were not reviewed
global.Za podněty k vývoji trequ vděčíme Elżbie: We are grateful to Elżbieta Kaczmarska for inciting the development of treq.
global.Škrabal, M. – Vavřín, M. (2017): Databáz: Škrabal, M. – Vavřín, M. (2017): Databáze překladových ekvivalentů Treq. Časopis pro moderní filologii 99 (2), s. 245–260.
global.Vyberte typy dat, které chcete zahrnout: Choose the type of data to be included in your search.
global.Vyhledávat v lemmatizované verzi databáz: Search in the lemmatized version of the database
global.Při zaškrtnutí pracuje se základními slo: With this option checked, Treq will use dictionary forms both for the search and results (cat-Katze, nice-gentil, sing-cantar) unlike the non-lemmatized option (cats-Katzen, nicer-plus gentil, sang-cantaban).
global.Při zaškrtnutí pracuje s verzí databáze,: With this option checked, Treq will search a different database which includes multiword expresions. (Note: This type of querying has a higher error rate.)
global.Použít regulární výrazy v dotazu: Use regular expressions in the query
global.Regulární výrazy jsou speciální znaky se: Regular expresions are special characters with a specific function (e.g. a dot stands for any one character) enabling complex querying. (Note: The results may take longer to compute.) Without checking this option, you can still use '%' as a substitute for a word or a word part (sing% finds the following word forms: singing, sings, singer etc.)
global.Při zaškrtnutí budou na dotaz <i>kočka</: With this option checked, Treq will return all forms of the word regardless of the capitalization (cat will find CAT, Cat etc.).
global.Které regulární výrazy mohu v Trequ použ: Which regular expressions can I use in Treq?
